entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
